text: Zbigniew Andruszkiewicz (born 1 November 1959) is a Polish rower. He competed in the men's quadruple sculls event at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Polish male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Poland Category:Rowers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Gdańsk
title: Zbigniew Andruszkiewicz
